## Introduction

* Obtain `mlnscript` from the Centre of Multilevel Modelling and then install it.
* On macOS it is recommended to install it to the `/opt/mln/` directory (which you will need to create)
* Check that `mlnscript` and its library are universal binaries
  ```
  % lipo -archs /opt/mln/mlnscript
  x86_64 arm64
  % lipo -archs /opt/mln/libmln.dylib
  x86_64 arm64
  ```

* Install R2MLwiN [@r2mlwin] from CRAN.

  ```r
  install.packages("R2MLwiN")
  ```

## Run an example

```{r}
library(R2MLwiN)
options(MLwiN_path = "/Applications/MLwiN/mlnscript")
```
